unnormalised: Mhunn, online mhaazhi bua ji-chea lognak ekdom *bhov bori* saree gheunk try kortali, bare? Ani sogllo experience… mhunnlear, ami fokot ankdeanchi bhumika sangonk zai, punn boro Bollywood-achi rit na. Eke comedy natka bhaxen.
normalised: Te, mhaka mhujem mhaji bua ji che lagna khatir ekdum mast saree online ghetalo, bare? Ani ho sogllo anubhav… mmm, chala dhara numbrancho ekdom mukhya rol aslo, punn boro Bollywood style na. Ekdom hasyachem natak ashem.

unnormalised: Poileak, "original" kimmat. ₹12,999.99 mhunn dakhoyloli. Mhunnlear, seriously? Konn tori oxem kimmat kitemk sangta? Tankam dista kai hi dodat 99 poixe mhaka deal mellta mhunn disonk laitat? Mhaka dista konn tori chalaak zaunk try korta. Mhojea azichye loklechea bazrant torun kathan korun vikte.
normalised: Poilem mhanllear, "original" kimmat. Rupee bara hazar nau she nau she navad nav ani navad nav paiso mhunn suchoilelem. Mhanllear, seriously? Konn kiteim ashi kimmat korta? Tankam dista kai hache voravoi nauad nav paiso mhaka bori deal melllya sarke lagtle? Mhaka fattir konn tori chotur korpak sodta mhunn dishta. Mhaka kal zolm zalonk na! Mhaji aji khuile bazarant haka poros chodd bhav kami korta.

unnormalised: Ani discount aile! Distalem, mhaka 60% discount mellta mhunn "thoddea vellak offer" aslem! Wow, borem, bare? Mhunnlear kimmat poddta, mhunnlear... website sangta ₹5199.99. Okay, torui thoddo shanka dista. Mhunnun calculator bhair kaddle (hoi, hanv ti aunty). Distaa, 60% 12,999.99-cho mhunnlear... ₹5199.99 nhoi. ₹5199.60 bhaxen. Borem, hanv te 39 poixe soddun divnk xakta. Zaumkodde tankam gol korunk zata. Zaumkodde tankam IIT-nt xikoitat oxem tori nvem math zata.
normalised: Magir discount aile! Dislem mhaka "limited time offer" melltta sat percent kami! Wow, zabardast, bare? Mhunn kimmat kami zalya, chala dhara… website kaita rupee panch hazar ek she nau she navad nav ani navad nav paiso. Okay, ajun tori thodi dubhavanchi vattita. Mhunn mhajem vishwasachi calculator bhair kadlem (ho, hanv T-H-A-T aunty). Dislem sat percent bara hazar nau she nau she navad nav ani navad nav paiso mhunnllear… rupee panch hazar ek she nau she navad nav ani navad nav paiso nhoi. Rupee panch hazar ek she nau she navad nav ani saat paiso mhunn dishta. Barem, hanv ekantisa nav paiso sodun ditam. Asuya tankam vatti ghatlya. Asuya tankam kiteim tori novinch ganit vaprat mhunn I-I-T vataim shikaita ashiya.

unnormalised: Punn thamb, ani asat! Shipping charges! ₹4999-cher free shipping! Yay! Oh, thamb… hanv ₹5199.99 bhortam. Mhunnlear, logic mhaka free shipping mellonk zai, bare? Na. Dodat "handling charges" ₹99.00. Handling kitem? Ti saree? Tankam ti box-ant dhoronk poddlem kai? Kapddeachea tukddiak pack korunk tankam special gloves zai kai? Hanv kalpita ek team, zantunt trained professionals asat, zannim saree-cho konso dharlolo asa ani tankam gham ieta.
normalised: Punn rav, ajun asa! Shipping charge! Rupee char hazar nau she navad nav poros voir free shipping! Yay! Are baba… hanv bhorta rupee panch hazar ek she nau she navad nav ani navad nav paiso. Mhunnllear, logic kaita mhaka free shipping mellto, bare? Na. Voir "handling charge" rupee nauad nav. Handling kiteim? Saree? Tankam petint ghalpak zait kai? Tanka ek kopdho pack korpak khas hat mhoje lagta kai? Mhaka suchtai ekdum tarbheti profesinalanchi team, ekek zon kopdhyachi konni dhorun, ghamak voitolim.

unnormalised: Ani, nimanne opman. Payment gateway. Multiple options, naral. Credit card, debit card, net banking, UPI… mhozo jiv vikunk option asa (okay, torui ti nimani na). Hanven UPI nivdlem, GPay-n bhortuk kelem. Transaction successful! ₹5298.99 mhojea account-antun utarle. Thamb. KITEM? 5199.99 + 99 = 5298.99. Dodat poixe khanchi aile?! Decimal places-acher tori gupt tax asa kai? RBI involve asa kai?
normalised: Ani magir, shevatachi beizati. Payment gateway. Kitinyach option, bechuke. Credit card, debit card, net banking, U-P-I… mhaji atma vikpakui option aslem (okay, te mat mhaka nattem). Hanv U-P-I chuntlem, G-Pay dvoran bharti kelem. Transaction zalyat! Rupee panch hazar don she nauad at ani nauad nav paiso mhaje khatyanthun kadhle. Rav. W-H-A-T? Panch hazar ek she nau she navad nav ani nauad nav paiso plus nauad nav mhunnllear panch hazar don she nauad at ani nauad nav paiso. Voirlo paiso kothaimthun ailo?! Decimal place-ancher kitiny tori tax asaiya kai? R-B-I involved asa kai?

unnormalised: Nimanne, order confirmation email. Order ID: #ECOM-2024-07-26-420. Seriously? 420? Tankam mhaka subtly sangonk zata kai hanv lootla mhunn? Estimated delivery: 10-15 business days. Business days! Zachem mhunnlear… potential thodde tin satdde! Eke saree-chea khatir! Mhaje bua ji-chem logn ieunk asa!
normalised: Shevak, order confirmation email. Order I-D: hash E-C-O-M- don hazar visar chovda- zero saat- visar sa- char she ani visar. Seriously? Char she ani visar? Tankam holkhinch sangonk sodtat kai mhaka lootait mhunn? Andazit delivery: dha te pandra business divas. Business divas! Mhunnllear… asuya tin hafta! Ek saree khatir! Mhaji bua ji chem lagn fuddla hafta!

unnormalised: Mhunnlear, hoi, online shopping. To ankdeacho game asa. Ani dista mhaka fokot ek ankdo jinkuk mellta mhunn, kitle pavtt hanv mhojea tonddak tap marunk zata mhunn. Zaumkodde hanven fokot local dukana-ntun saree gheunk zai. Hanv tori bori tarekan korun vikta mhunn ani hi e-commerce-chi numerical shenanigans avoid korun zata.
normalised: Mhunnllear, ho, online shopping. Ti eka numbraanchi kel mhunn kaita, barre. Ani dishta ek numbr hanv jetam mhunn te numbr dharan kitei hanv mhajim tallem pethit ghatam mhunn. Asuya hanv khuile shopantlem saree gheun ravon zai. Atlyak hanv bore bhav kami korpak zannam ani e-commerce numeric ghotalem sodun dium zata!
